Modules

Here is a list of all modules:
  • Concepts: concept definitions
  • Geometry: geometric objects
  • area: area calculation algorithms
  • centroid: centroid calculation algorithms
  • distance: distance calculation algorithms
  • envelope: envelope calculation algorithms
  • intersection: intersection algorithms
  • length: length calculation algorithms
  • loop: Loops and for-each functionality
  • simplify: line/polygon simplification algorithms
  • utility: utilities (copy coordinates, assign coordinates in "neutral" way)
  • within: containment algorithms such as point in polygon
